column4: hey guys i just downloaded the rc interpid ibex and it wont boot (AMD Barton 2800+, 1GB ram, ATI HD2400) ... it gets me to the gdm and there it stops
and then only the caps lock led is blinking .. and nothing starts. does anybody know that bug?
caps lock blinking is a sign of a bad crash...
hmm does this mean the new kernel messed something up. 8.04 runs ok
